everybody can keep working off that um branching emerging um one of the big ones that I I see people light up when I
explain it to them is the uh continuous reintegration you can continuously reintegrate branches and get and that's
very difficult to do in most other systems especially subversion even with like the merge tickets that that they have recently is is you can create a
branch like for you know changing your database backend or or adding translations to your system or something
that takes a long time and generally would would be this merge hell that everybody would have to go to uh go
through and and you can just be on that branch and continuously reintegrate the Master Branch into it very easily and at
